properties.verseOrder: v1 c v2 c b c

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You were the Word at the beginning One With God the Lord Most High Your hidden glory in creation Now revealed in You our Christ

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: What a beautiful Name it is What a beautiful Name it is The Name of Jesus Christ my King What a beautiful Name it is Nothing compares to this What a beautiful Name it is The Name of Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You didn't want heaven without us So Jesus, You brought heaven down My sin was great, Your love was greater What could separate us now

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: What a wonderful Name it is What a wonderful Name it is The Name of Jesus Christ my King What a wonderful Name it is Nothing compares to this What a wonderful Name it is The Name of Jesus What a wonderful Name it is The Name of Jesus

verse.name: b
verse.lines: Death could not hold You, the veil tore before You You silenced the boast, of sin and grave The heavens are roaring, the praise of Your glory For You are raised to life again
You have no rival, You have no equal Now and forever, Our God reigns Yours is the Kingdom, Yours is the glory Yours is the Name, above all names

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: What a powerful Name it is What a powerful Name it is The Name of Jesus Christ my King What a powerful Name it is Nothing can stand against What a powerful Name it is The Name of Jesus
